title: Want better Cooling? Get this. - ASUS RTX 4070 GPUs
description: Thanks to ASUS for sponsoring todays video! Are you ready to flow to victory? With higher performance and lower GPU temperatures, ASUS's TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 and ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 4070 are available now! Link:   Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070:  Buy an ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 4070:  Buy an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 FE:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 THIS...is a 4070 1:32 TUF Gaming RTX 4070 Unboxing 2:36 DUAL RTX 4070 Unboxing 3:15 Size Comparison 5:41 GPU Install + Benchmarking 9:05 Gaming
